title: Bloomberg Markets: Yiheng Said to Gain 50% This Year on China

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Hema Parmar\u0010Hedge Fund Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Brief\u0010Discussing her Brief story "Hedge Fund Yiheng Is Said to Gain 50% This Year on China Stocks" and her interview with Man Group's fund of hedge fund unit.
